ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl

Class AbstractGlslProgramUniform<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl.AbstractGlslProgramInput<T>
      • ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl.AbstractGlslProgramLocatableInput<T>
        • ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl.AbstractGlslProgramUniform<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, Managed<GpuShaderProgram>, Nameable, GpuShaderProgram.Input<T>, GpuShaderProgram.LocatableInput<T>, GpuShaderProgram.Uniform<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlslProgramUniformBool, GlslProgramUniformFloat, GlslProgramUniformInt, GlslProgramUniformMat3, GlslProgramUniformMat4, GlslProgramUniformVec3, GlslProgramUniformVec4

    abstract class AbstractGlslProgramUniform<T>
extends AbstractGlslProgramLocatableInput<T>
implements GpuShaderProgram.Uniform<T>
    Base implementation for the GpuShaderProgram.Uniform interface.

    These values do not change during a given rendering call, that is, they remain "uniform".

    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera
